You then hear a voice and look to your left to see there is a Pokemon prancing around. You had entered the world of the Pokemon. This was a reality that many dared to dream about, and none but you had gotten the chance to live. The chance to be among the Pokemon you only got to see on TV, and maybe be able to live your fantasy, whatever you decide it would be. But wait, now that your here, you notice that you are....

choices: You're not immune to the acid
121112.content:
The Blaziken opens his beak, revealing his saliva drenched maw. You scream as you're tossed onto the tongue, the beak sealing shut behind you. You try to plead with Pokémon, but you're silenced the tongue sloshing you around; savoring you succulent sapor. You eventually find yourself face-down and facing the fearsome throat. The entire chamber then starts to tilt towards the throat. You desperately try to cling to the tongue, but it was far too slippery to get a grip on. You slide down to the back of the throat and are gulped down, being squeezed and sent down the esophagus. After being forced down the tightening tunnel, you're pushed past a sphincter a pullet into the stomach.

As you're about to splash down, you pray that you somehow gained acid immunity when you entered the Pokémon world.
121112.title: A rooster's refreshment

1211122.content:
When you land in the stomach acid, you see that your clothes are starting to dissolve and you feel a tingling sensation that very quickly turns into a burning feeling. You grit your teeth and close your eyes so you won't see what's happening to your body. The horrible burning eventually turns to numbness and you feel yourself growing tired. Right before you lose consciousness, you see a very bright light.

---

As the Blaziken rubbed his belly after swallowing his snack before he heard a voice call out to him.

"Blaziken!" A young woman shouted. "Play time's over, it's time to head to the Day Care!" The Blaziken responded to his trainer's call, leaping into the air before landing next to her. "Oh, there you are!" She happily said before patting her Pokémon and the back. "C'mon big guy, I've got just the perfect Pokémon for you to mate with." The two then walked off, head for the nearby building that was run by a kindly old couple.

---

You feel really weird as you awaken; groggy, but relieved that dying in that Blaziken's stomach was apparently just a really freaky dream. You also feel like you're floating in a warm liquid. As you sight starts to come back to you, you see the blurry image of something that looked like a big, white tadpole. When your vision fully returns, you then see that you're floating around in a liquid that's filled with millions of these oversized tadpoles. You then realise that you're one of the things and a horrible realization dawns on you.

Oh dear Arceus, I'm a sperm in something's balls!

As you panickedly ponder the possibility of the preposterous transformation you've faced, you hear a pair of voices that were muffled by the flesh of whoever or whatever you're in.

"We'll take good care of your precious Pokémon. The two to get along very well!" You hear an old man say.

"Thanks sir. Be sure to mate with her, Blaziken. I really want that egg!" A woman's voice speaks, making you realise that your nightmare was apparently real. You had been digested and somehow you had been turned into a Pokémon's sperm.

Wait a second... did she say mate?!

You grow more and more worried for several minutes before the testicles start to shake, signaling that Blaziken had started to mate with the other Pokémon his trainer had dropped off. You try to calm yourself, thinking that this could be your one chance at survival. As you wonder what Pokémon you could be reborn as, you remember that Blaziken is apart of the Field egg group in the games, meaning what you could be reborn as were limited.

As the shaking starts to increase in pace, you hear the female Pokémon moan out her species name. It was...

You're quickly launched out of the Pokémon's penis and sent crashing into the Lucario's cervix. As you gain your bearings, you realise that there are millions of other sperm in there with you that'll try to fertilize her egg. On that notion, you dive into the cervical canal. After a few moments of swimming, you make it into the uterus. You journey deeper into the womb until you eventually find what the cell you had been seeking, the ovum. Will this Lucario lay an egg like in the games, or will she have a live birth?

12112.content:
Looking up at the colossal hen, something catches your attention on.. their ear? They continue moving and you remember the feet. In a panic, you watch the nearest pillar come nearer and try to Flee. Then the ruffle comes down and you Can’t escape. Spending the next few seconds trying to dig your way out through the branches, you feel lift and everything is like a weeping pine tree..

You are shaken a little at the feeling of weightlessness. That sensation ends, replaced by even more downward force and light has returned to your eyes. Ouf. Heaviness resumes as you adjust your eyes quickly. You would see a familiar view, but between claws- then the hand turns you around to see that beak from above.

The Blazekin glared at you with wide eyes. You grip as much of her hand as you can and speak up. “You’re a rare one.” It tells you like a crack of thunder. You’d even forgotten what you said, or did you say? Um, “Hi’m.. I’am small.” She gives you an ear, “Speak up.”

“Thank you, miss Blaziken.. Can you make me bigger?” You bravely query.

“Oh!” she brings you to her front again. “Well, not sure if I know how, but glad to be of service.” The hen glances at the surrounding trees. “I think it’s this way.” She says, dropping you to swing with her arm as a gait begins. Then your makeshift Tilt-a-whirl ends with a muffled thunder.

The next words made out are: “~you ok?” and “I am obviously not” in your own head. You do writhe a little and she knows you’re alive, accidentally sighing on you. Awake enough, you hang on a finger and she asks a series of questions to herself about how she can carry for you. On a shoulder? That’s totally precarious. Head? You do have her stalks, kinda sensitive, but all that hair, too. “Does that sound good? You fine on my head?
12112.title: Blazing Hen

choices: Magical Makings’ little hung-up sign on the right.
the best probability of people. That Evolve Your Career carving on.. her.. right
121121.content:
“Alright, just hold on, darling.” You get put to her head and grasp the near topper to pull yourself onto a more secure position. She has the decency to lean in a little aid as needed. Once you settle, she asks if you’re good. “Could be better...” She says a hum and “Maybe you can tweak my feathers a little. Ye’ good?” Welp, take her advice and she responds “Ok.” She is moving, it’s smooth, if a little breezy. You might have expected a little more.. bobbing or something, bigger than soft rocking.

The view is pleasant and it’s easy to keep your eyes clear. Riding through the woods for a while, your generous mount(ain) begins jolting its head left and right. you can’t make out why, but kinda hope she didn’t forget about you. Pulling yourself to a single antenna, the Blaziken puts a hand up as if to assist. “Sorry, Hun, I am not totally certain one way or the other.” Might as well sit for a spell while figuring this out. “You want to grow, right? Now, there’s a friend of mine who can help, and they have some signs to guide poké over, but i’m sure there ought to be one here, it’s so familiar.” From your vantage point, it’s right in front of you.. over her shoulder, it looks like a Gypsy business. That might have some idea, if it’s not part, of why you’re here. Or the blatant advertisement on her other side, It looks popular- “What’cha looking at? Do i got something?” You look back to the face of your current.. Starter, i guess, which switches your seat and brushes its shoulder scruff. “D’d I get it?” she asks right before gazing softly for approval. You point at..
121121.title: High Hat of a Hen

121122.content: “Ok.. just- hold onto my frill.” she says, sudden dimples appearing at the back of her beak. You are let onto the fuzz more than her shoulder. “Ok, Little Fella, let’s find that way to grow.” An easy walk begins, her neck bobbing smoothly, but she seems to be pulling herself away from you. You did notice her scruff is kinda like a mane- “I’m Acacia” her throat rumbles in response to the general quiet you barely heard. “May I call you by your name?” “Why not?” you figure, climbing to your feet and you crane your neck back as she leans her decor closer. “______” that’s a nice Shiny Fletchling. “Aw, nice to meet you.. So, I think Velichko could help you get that boost. He used to get us in trouble and knows his way around a lot of mischief...
121122.title: You’d be fine below.

1211222.content:
“Times have changed, obviously, I was only a Torchic the first few missions. That certainly leveled me up quicker than I think I would have done on my own. We found all sorts of stuff, all of it magical at that-” she had just patted your back and held there. The hen hesitantly pulls you off, looking. “..Are you trying to switch shoulders?” Your head shakes, her eyes think. “Were you just hanging there?” Her other hand is put in that visible gasp position and she watches your response. “..Do you want to stay? I~ I won’t know when you fall.”

Assurance is issued in an animated manner that seems to work. The face looks confused as it appears to rise and you are carefully brought to smush in her neck fluff. Her hand actually stays for a while as you settle in and you see she’s going slow along whatever path she holds ahead of you. She cautiously lowers her arm to rest and continues easily, not filling the quiet anymore. Not that it isn’t still pleasant, many sounds come to your ears now. There is a distant group of tweets, some wind brushing branches in each other, very few signs of other creatures, but her heart rate feels a little stressed. This is how travel continues.
1211222.title: Climb below the chicken chin.

12112222.content:
As the Blaziken walks, you decide to dare yourself. The feathery fur is everywhere, so you should be able to grasp your way anywhere. True, you are, making the walk slow very carefully without outside comment. She seems tense, maybe you could relax her. The breasts are hidden, but you found them beneath the tall, sideways grass. Grabbing hold and beginning to swing yourself, “Please~” is a response that rolls out. “..stop pulling.” You do so, but continue dropping yourself down by the arms and your rock.. climbing wall shivers. No further response comes to your ears, but a glint passes down on your path. A foot finds her belly button. Though, crevice covered by cloudy calamus, you go around it without bothering any more purposely.

This is where you either swipe right to the backside or swing low to get this chick more active. “Ok!” comes from above while her hand is approaching. Well, she’s already more active..

121122222.content:
Management of your grips happens with speed and you catch yourself at a little swing on a sideways knoll. Your former friend shrieks and slaps you, which didn’t help her position at all. It did help yours, pulling her lips, now. You get a grip and a whine, using your legs. Then, she covers you and tries to catch your head in her talons when you slip yourself further by the elbows. Glad, you’re lighter at this size.

Everything you feel shivers and total weightlessness returns. Brace for impact. None of which, strikes you, she seems to have caught herself. Bouncing a little as you stretch yourself, she shoves you deeper by your hands and you’re standing upside down. Fingers wiggle, maybe for you, so you pull away. Trying to ball up, your idea is to get upright again.

She’s moaning, every syllable muffled by feather and fetter, if not your own, extremely personal, business. Writhe and pull up, whines continue with the rest. Your movement sending instant feedback around you in every sense. Service is much appreciated, cervix is just unviolated. Acacia’s constant clenching keeps all control in your claws as you’ve pushed everywhere by now. A burst comes from overhead as a high sound is heard from some apparent distance. The whole area hardens and your fingers can grasp an edge above.

13511121.title: Renegade Feral In The City

135111211.content:
That's right, you are the king predator- not to mention the primary reason the city no longer has a problem with strays- and you deserve respect! You are the embodiment of predation, and nothing can stand against you, especially not when you have the cover of a city to aid your stealthy attacks.
You would be cut from your thoughts by the horn of a car, only to roll your eyes. "Petty humans can't live with a few seconds of traffic..." However as you look up to assess what really happened you see a building, it's billboard reading "The Den"... it looked professional and had a sign saying "feral pokemon welcome"... A bit suspicious you had to admit but highly intriguing. Contemplating your options you look around and see a blur, obviously a runaway pokemon, or in your mind a quick meal...
135111211.title: Apex Predator

info.brief_description: You have woken up in the world of Pokemon, and somehow your younger, and/or smaller.
info.description:
So, you wake up one day to find yourself in some place that is very similar to home, but, it looks different. You realise it is different when you see that there are pokemon roaming everywhere. All different types. But, the question is, are you still human, or are you a Pokemon yourself. You decide.

In this story you will have the option of being shrunk, but there will also be a story line where you are normal size human or Pokemon. There will be no limitations on which pokemon you can be. All existing Pokemon, no matter what tv series season or came series are fine, and I will also allow fan-made pokemon. (ex: Arcticanine, the ice version of Arcanine.) If you do turn pokemon upon arrival, be aware that there can be stroylines where humans will catch you for whatever purpose, be they a trainer or team rocket or anything else. If you are human, there will be the chance to become a trainer, breeder, team rocket, or other such titles humans take. Also be aware that if you are a human, there is a chance a pokemon might outsmart you and either make you it's next meal or have you become it's young by means of transformation. Unbirth is one posibility. This can also happen even if your pokemon already.

Things I will allow in this story:
1. Unbirth
2. Pregnancy. (you can follow the mother's pov, if the main character is unbirthed for the time being and/or in an egg for the time being depending upon whether the Pokemon mother gives live birth or lays eggs. And yes there will be the selection to end up in a human womans womb, but only if your human to begin with. And once the main character is reborn, you have to go back to the main character's pov.)
3. transgender (This can only be done when the main character is unbirthed or transformed by other means)
4. soft oral and breast vore (Only pokemon are allowed this ability.)
5. age regression (This can happen upon arrival, but you can choose to go younger.)
6. breastfeeding. (This of course and can only be done by pokemon considered to be mammals, so Pokemon like Arboc and Charzard are unable to do this.)
7. babying
8. diapers can be involved if you are a human baby in this story. (Don't go into heavy description about using the diaper, or the chapter will be deleted.)
9. transformation into Pokemon of course. (like earlier stated, this can be achived through means of unbirth. It can also be achieved by means of getting bitten, kind of like if a vampire or werewolf bit you. Pokemon using magical forces, or any other creative means you can think of are also allowed.)
10. Death is allowed if the main character is orally vored and digested, but their soul will be transferred to any unborn children the Pokemon that vored them plans to have. Do not have the story end on a death chapter or it will be deleted.
11. parings of straight couples. So this can be between two of the same Pokemon, but different genders. The main character can also have a partner, whether they are human or Pokemon.
12. Sex, but not in front of young ones, especially the main character if they are just a kid.

Things not allowed in this story:
1. Hard vore.
2. anal vore
3. using the main character or other characters as personal toys or toilets.
4.. absorbtion in the breast or womb. (even though I allowed digestion, that is only if they get orally vored.)
5. turning good characters into bad characters (unless you provide an extremely good reason for doing so.)
6. permanent death of the main character. (like stated earlier, any chapters that end the story at death will be deleted.)
7. rape (there will be no forced sex on any character, including the main character.)
8. gay couples. (Do not try and work around this like trying to pair up two characters after one has become the same gender as the the other. Chapters involving gay couples or gay references will be deleted.)
9. Gore and blood (I'm not one for that kind of violence. I'll allow a few bruises and light scratches, but nothing more.)
10. making humans become giant or Pokemon that are not as tall as buildings to begin with become giants

If there are other things you wish to include in the story that was not mentioned, give me a shout in my on-site email and I'll let you know what will be allowed. Have fun with the chapters you add and be sure to provide selections for others to branch off of. Help me get at least 75 chaptersup. Thank you.
